ANOVA

Source: R/univariate.R
anova.Rd

One-way analysis of variance (ANOVA).

anova(
  x,
  cls = "class",
  pAdjust = "bonferroni",
  comparisons = list(),
  returnModels = FALSE
)

# S4 method for AnalysisData
anova(
  x,
  cls = "class",
  pAdjust = "bonferroni",
  comparisons = list(),
  returnModels = FALSE
)

Arguments

x

S4 object of class AnalysisData
cls

a vector of sample info column names to analyse
pAdjust

p value adjustment method
comparisons

list of comparisons to perform
returnModels

should models be returned

Examples

library(metaboData)

d <- analysisData(abr1$neg[,200:300],abr1$fact)

## Perform ANOVA
anova_analysis <- anova(d,cls = 'day')

## Extract significant features
explanatoryFeatures(anova_analysis)
